abstract: City of Chicago lawyer Jordan Marsh resigns same day Judge Edmond E Chang finds he and a colleague intentionally concealed crucial evidence that would have influenced ruling for 2011 fatal police shooting of Darius Pinex; Judge Chang, in light of discovery, throws out jury’s verdict that cleared officers of wrongdoing and orders city to pay plaintiffs’ legal bills.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge found that he and a colleague had committed misconduct by waiting to turn over key evidence in a civil case about a police shooting.

headline.main: Illinois: City Lawyer Quits After Judge Finds Misconduct
headline.print_headline: Illinois: City Lawyer Quits After Judge Finds Misconduct

snippet: A federal judge found that he and a colleague had committed misconduct by waiting to turn over key evidence in a civil case about a police shooting.
